meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one thousandth of a meter.
meanings.sent1: The ruler showed that the pencil was only a few millimeters long.
meanings.sent2: She measured the width of the paper in millimeters.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant thought the millimeters on the ruler were giant steps.
meanings.sent4: The rain fell in delicate millimeters, like nature's ruler.
meanings.sent5: The millimeters on the measuring tape were as small as a whisper.

meanings.sent1: The recipe called for two millimeters of salt.
meanings.sent2: He counted the millimeters on the ruler to make sure he had enough.
meanings.sent3: The millimeters in the jar rolled around like tiny marbles.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky seemed as numerous as millimeters in a ruler.
meanings.sent5: The millimeters of rain filled the cup like drops of time.
